picklistValues.masterLabel: Prepopulate Read-Only - Pre-Populate the Lead Form when a Lead ID is passed in the URL, but make it read-only, so the user can not make any changes.
Prepopulate the Lead Form - Pre-Populate the Lead Form when a Lead ID is passed in the URL and update the lead with any changes made in the lead form data.
Skip the Lead Form - Skip the Lead Form when a Lead ID is passed in the URL.
